Description of incident: Voya Financial Advisors notified customers of a data breach when they discovered unauthorized access to the company's systems, including client records. The information compromised included names, addresses, dates of birth, last four digits of Social Security numbers, driver's license number, passport number and other government issued ID's, telephone numbers, email addresses, account numbers and account balances.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-61193
